page.title: 10Health in the Country.
page.content: Although some{doctors}live in this area, there are no surgeries. If you are ill, you have to go to Woodlands Scawsby or South Elmsall. Our nearest {hospitals}are at Doncaster and Pontefract.{Health }centres are at Scawsby, Woodlands and Doncaster.At the{Health }centres,there are facilities for chiropody,{dentists, } {doctors }and X_rays. Home helps are sent to people's houses.The home help who lives in our area has six people to vist during the week.The district nurse vists people in this area if you are ill or if you have had a baby. A lot of babies have been born recently in our area and a lot of people have been ill.There has been a lot of accidents because of careless driving by people who are not used to the roads.They are usally taken to Doncaster Royal Infirmary .
